sn48.18:1.3: The faculties of faith, energy, mindfulness, immersion, and wisdom.
sn48.18:1.5: Someone who has completed and fulfilled these five faculties is a perfected one. If they are weaker than that, they’re practicing to realize the fruit of perfection … a non-returner … practicing to realize the fruit of non-return … a once-returner … practicing to realize the fruit of once-return … a stream-enterer … practicing to realize the fruit of stream-entry.
sn48.18:1.6: Someone who totally and utterly lacks these five faculties is an outsider who belongs with the ordinary persons, I say.”
